title: Alternatives to Sackers Gothic font
content: I'm looking for an alternative to Sackers, ideally something a little more elegant or feminine but with a similarly classy authority - think Marc Jacobs logo. It'll be used in a logotype with no curved letters, in fact only V,Y,L,E, I and N and all caps. Trade Gothic Extended is one but just wondering if anybody knew of any others to try out.
author: kitkats

comments.content:
Hi Steve,  
also check out this recent thread: [http://typophile.com/node/59508](http://web.archive.org/web/20150301193400/http:/typophile.com/node/59508 "http://typophile.com/node/59508")  
F
Thanks people. Helpful - Engravers was the one I knew I'd forgotten (if you see what I mean) but Neutraface might work too.
Here's another, [Salaryman](http://web.archive.org/web/20150301193400/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Salaryman) it's completely free and available as a web font from FontSquirrel.
